TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides functionality to split a string into text elements and to iterate through those text elements.

span.span: Provides functionality to split a string into text elements and to iterate through those text elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 标准定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 类使您能够将字符串作为一系列文本元素而不是单个 对象进行处理。The class enables you to work with a string as a series of textual elements rather than individual objects. 若要实例化对象，表示指定的字符串内，你可以执行以下任一操作：To instantiate a object that represents a specified string, you can do either of the following: - 调用构造函数并将其传递该字符串的对象是作为自变量表示。Call the constructor and pass it the string that the object is to represent as an argument. - 调用默认构造函数，并将字符串分配对象将表示为属性。Call the default constructor, and assign the string that the object is to represent to the property. 可通过两种方式处理字符串中的单个文本元素：You can work with the individual text elements in a string in two ways: - 通过枚举每个文本元素。By enumerating each text element. 为此，您可以调用 方法，然后对返回的 对象重复调用 方法，直到此方法返回 `false`。To do this, you call the method, and then repeatedly call the method on the returned object until the method returns `false`. - 通过调用 方法检索包含每个文本元素的起始索引的数组。By calling the method to retrieve an array that contains the starting index of each text element. 然后可通过将这些索引传递给 方法来检索单个文本元素。You can then retrieve individual text elements by passing these indexes to the method. 下面的示例阐释了两种处理字符串中的文本元素的方法。The following example illustrates both ways of working with the text elements in a string. 它创建两个字符串：It creates two strings: - `strCombining`，它是一个阿拉伯语字符串，包含三个文本元素和多个 对象。`strCombining`, which is a string of Arabic characters that includes three text elements with multiple objects. 第一个文本元素是后跟 ARABIC HAMZA BELOW (U+-655) 和 ARABIC KASRA (U+0650) 的基字符 ARABIC LETTER ALEF (U+-627)。The first text element is the base character ARABIC LETTER ALEF (U+-627) followed by ARABIC HAMZA BELOW (U+-655) and ARABIC KASRA (U+0650). 第二个文本元素是后跟 ARABIC FATHA (U+-64E) 的 ARABIC LETTER HEH (U+0647)。The second text element is ARABIC LETTER HEH (U+0647) followed by ARABIC FATHA (U+-64E). 第三个文本元素是后跟 ARABIC DAMMATAN (U+064C) 的 ARABIC LETTTER BEH (U+0628)。The third text element is ARABIC LETTTER BEH (U+0628) followed by ARABIC DAMMATAN (U+064C). - `strSurrogates`，它是一个包含三个代理项对的字符串：辅助多语言平面中的 GREEK ACROPHONIC FIVE TALENTS (U+10148)、增补表意字符平面中的 U+20026 以及私有使用区中的 U+F1001。`strSurrogates`, which is a string that includes three surrogate pairs: GREEK ACROPHONIC FIVE TALENTS (U+10148) from the Supplementary Multilingual Plane, U+20026 from the Supplementary Ideographic Plane, and U+F1001 from the private user area. 每个字符的 UTF-16 编码是一个代理项对，其中依次包含一个高代理项和一个低代理项。The UTF-16 encoding of each character is a surrogate pair that consists of a high surrogate followed by a low surrogate. 每个字符串依次通过 方法和 方法分析一次。Each string is parsed once by the method and then by the method. 两个方法都可正确分析两个字符串中的文本元素并显示分析操作的结果。Both methods correctly parse the text elements in the two strings and display the results of the parsing operation. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.StringInfo.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.stringinfo.class/cs/indexing1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.StringInfo.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.stringinfo.class/vb/indexing1.vb#1)] ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用并方法的类包含代理项和组合字符的字符串进行处理。This example shows how to use the and methods of the class to manipulate a string that contains surrogate and combining characters. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

span.para: 在内部的方法类调用的方法类，以确定字符类别。从 [！INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，字符分类基于 [Unicode 标准 8.0.0 版] (https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0)。有关 [！INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 到 [！INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，它基于 [Unicode 标准 6.3.0 版] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。

Internally, the methods of the class call the methods of the class to determine character categories. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], character classification is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0). For the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] through the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], it is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新值对象初始化为空字符串 ("")。The value of the new object is initialized to the empty string (""). 可以为其分配另一个字符串，通过使用属性。You can assign another string to it by using the property. 此外可以实例化对象，表示在单个步骤中指定的字符串通过调用构造函数。You can also instantiate a object that represents a specified string in a single step by calling the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为取决于其实现中，从公共语言运行时的一个版本到另一个可能会变化。The behavior of is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another. 可能发生此事件来提高的性能。This might happen to improve the performance of . 若要使的行为常量，该应用程序应重写的运行时实现已知永远不变的实现。To make the behavior of constant, the application should override the runtime implementation of with an implementation known to never change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 此方法仅返回第一个文本元素。This method only returns the first text element. 若要循环访问字符串的文本元素，该应用程序应使用对象生成的方法。To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the object generated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 标准定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 此方法仅返回指定索引处开始的子字符串的第一个文本元素。This method only returns the first text element of the substring that starts at the specified index. 若要循环访问字符串的文本元素，该应用程序应使用生成的方法。To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the generated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 标准定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 文本元素枚举器仅用于读取; 在字符串中的数据它不能修改基础字符串。The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string. 枚举器不具有独占访问字符串。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string. 枚举器处于无效状态，如果它定位在字符串中或在字符串中的最后一个文本元素之后的第一个文本元素之前。The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string. 当枚举器处于无效状态时，调用将引发异常。When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling throws an exception. 最初，枚举数位于字符串中的第一个文本元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 因此，创建一个枚举器或调用时，枚举数前移到字符串的第一个文本元素，读取的值之前必须调用。Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 传递的字符串的末尾之后，枚举器再次处于无效状态并且调用返回`false`。After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling returns `false`. 调用到最后一次调用时引发异常返回`false`。Calling throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 标准定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 文本元素枚举器仅用于读取; 在字符串中的数据它不能修改基础字符串。The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string. 枚举器不具有独占访问字符串。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string. 枚举器处于无效状态，如果它定位在字符串中或在字符串中的最后一个文本元素之后的第一个文本元素之前。The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string. 当枚举器处于无效状态时，调用将引发异常。When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling throws an exception. 最初，枚举数位于字符串中的第一个文本元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 因此，创建一个枚举器或调用时，枚举数前移到字符串的第一个文本元素，读取的值之前必须调用。Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 传递的字符串的末尾之后，枚举器再次处于无效状态并且调用返回`false`。After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling returns `false`. 调用到最后一次调用时引发异常返回`false`。Calling throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`.

span.span: An array of integers that contains the zero-based indexes of each base character, high surrogate, or control character within the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义为包含两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个较低的一系列的单一抽象字符的编码的字符集表示形式的代理项对代理项。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. 高代理项是 Unicode 码位 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 范围中和低代理项是 Unicode 码位 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 范围中。A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF. 控制字符是字符的 Unicode 值为 U + 007F 或范围 u+0000 到 U + 001F 或 u+0080 到 U + 009F 中。A control character is a character for which the Unicode value is U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F. .NET Framework 作为一个单元显示为单个字符，即，字形的文本定义的文本元素。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 一个文本元素可以是基字符、 代理项对或组合字符序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义组合字符序列作为基字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对可以表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 如果组合字符序列无效，该序列中的每个组合字符也会返回。If a combining character sequence is invalid, every combining character in that sequence is also returned. 生成数组中的每个索引是一个文本元素，基字符或高代理项的索引开始。Each index in the resulting array is the beginning of a text element, that is, the index of the base character or the high surrogate. 每个元素的长度轻松地将计算为后续索引之间的差异。The length of each element is easily computed as the difference between successive indexes. 数组的长度将始终小于或等于字符串的长度。The length of the array will always be less than or equal to the length of the string. 例如，给定字符串"\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01"，此方法返回索引 0、 2 和 4。For example, given the string "\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01", this method returns the indexes 0, 2, and 4. ## 等效成员Equivalent Members 在.NET Framework 的 2.0 版中启动方法和属性提供易于使用的提供的功能实现方法。Starting in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, the method and property provide an easy to use implementation of the functionality offered by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实例化对象时，其属性设置为以下值之一：When a object is instantiated, its property is set to one of the following values: - 如果默认调用。 if the default is called. 然后，应使用属性来将字符串分配此对象 rperesents。You should then use the property to assign the string that this object rperesents. - 为提供的字符串`value`自变量构造函数。The string supplied as the `value` argument to the constructor.

summary.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object.

span.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string SubstringByTextElements(int32 startingTextElement) cil managed
Public Function SubstringByTextElements (startingTextElement As Integer) As String

param.name: startingTextElement
param.span: The zero-based index of a text element in this object.

span.span: The zero-based index of a text element in this object.

summary.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the last text element.

span.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the last text element.

returns.span: A substring of text elements in this object, starting from the text element index specified by the parameter and continuing through the last text element in this object.

span.span: A substring of text elements in this object, starting from the text element index specified by the parameter and continuing through the last text element in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请考虑索引从 0 到 4 的五个文本元素组成的字符串。Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4. 如果`startingTextElement`参数为 1，方法返回的子字符串，包含文本元素的索引为 1、 2、 3 和 4。If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1, the method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, 3, and 4.

exception.span: -or- The string that is the value of the current object is the empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请考虑索引从 0 到 4 的五个文本元素组成的字符串。Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4. 如果`startingTextElement`参数为 1 并且`lengthInTextElements`参数为 3，方法返回的子字符串，包含文本元素的索引为 1、 2 和 3。If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1 and the `lengthInTextElements` parameter is 3, the method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, and 3.
